changes: Added child scopes for procedures and triggers
Separated symbol management into root and child scopes
Added methods for collecting and retrieving symbols from all scopes

gotchas_discovered: Previous implementation lacked scope context for procedures and triggers
Global symbols and local symbols were not properly separated
Potential issues with symbol visibility and resolution

key_improvements: Created root scope for global symbols
Added child scopes for procedures and triggers
Implemented symbol tracking with hierarchical context

recommendations: Add method to retrieve scope at a specific code offset
Implement more robust symbol resolution across scopes
Consider adding type checking and validation for symbols
Add unit tests to validate scope and symbol management
